category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA_check_in_on_save
preference.preference_description: Controls if datasets will be automatically checked in to Teamcenter during save from TCAA. Possible values: 0 - Do not Check-In dataset on save. Users will manually perform Check-In. (Default) 1 - Check-In dataset on save
